name: Ano What? Why Bakit??

From the same writer of ReWound 101 comes a random otome game that popped out of nowhere: Ano What? Why Bakit??

Literally translates:
What What? Why Why?

➻ Ano means What in Filipino
➻ Bakit means Why in Filipino

Brace yourselves for some ridiculous humor and cliche romance that will make you flip every tables you see...

It's just a random story I came up with my free time... really 🏃

English Translation: 10% progress
Proofreading: --

STATISTICS:

The game contains 2,022 dialogue blocks, containing 12,021 words and 67,928 characters, for an average of 5.9 words and 34 characters per block.

The game contains 11 menus, 86 images, and 12 screens.
